The thing is, these males are genuine transwomen like any other. In the past they would have been called transvestites and their dressing up would be confined to home (and maybe public meet ups, for the braver ones). Now the trans umbrella is inclusive of cross dressers and 'transvestite' is no longer a word that gets used.
